headline.main: BROADCASTERS DENY PREJUDICE CHARGES; CBS and NBC Answer Flynn on Charges of Unfairness

lead_paragraph: Replying by John T. Flynn, chairman of the New York chapter of the American First Committee, who accused CBS and the other major radio networks of prejudice in favor of the interventionist cause at a rally in Madison Square Garden last night, the Columbia Broadcasting System issued the following statement:
abstract: CBS and NBC reply to Flynn
